# jrdf - Just rename the damn files

Utility that changes the Movies/Shows filenames in the Jellyfin structure

# Install

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

# Usage

```bash
python3 jrdf.py -h
````

## Movies

```bash
python3 jrdf.py -M folders
```

## TV Shows

```bash
python3 jrdf.py -T folders
```
